description:
This lightning talks session gives members of our group the chance to spend 10-15 minutes sharing an idea, experience or approach with a friendly and supportive audience.

The call for speakers is now open - so if you would like to take part then please get in touch with one of the leadership team.

This was well received the last time we ran this so you are advised to sign up ahead of the headliners being announced!
title: Lightning Talks
